decisions.description: Routing dependent on what the household status is.
decisions.name: Account_status
decisions.label: Account status

decisions.description: Routes appropriately depending on the choice made by the user
decisions.name: Choice
decisions.label: Choice?

Flow.description: This flow walks a user through management of a household with option and flow contextual to the household and its status.

formulas.description: Builds the text for the body of the notification that is sent to the dedicated specialist assigned to a household.
formulas.name: NotificationBody
formulas.expression: "You are now the dedicated specialist for " & {!Get_household_details.Name}

Flow.label: Account - manage household

recordUpdates.description: Transfers any tasks to the specialist that are: - open - currently owned by the team queue
recordUpdates.name: Transfer_open_tasks_specialist_added
recordUpdates.label: Transfer open tasks

recordUpdates.description: Transfers any tasks to the team that are: - not started - owner by the current dedicated specialist
recordUpdates.name: Transfer_open_tasks_specialist_removed
recordUpdates.label: Transfer open tasks

recordUpdates.description: Transfers any tasks to the team that are: - not started - owner by the current dedicated specialist
recordUpdates.name: Transfer_open_tasks_specialist_removed_0
recordUpdates.label: Transfer open tasks

recordUpdates.description: Transfers any tasks to the new team that are: - open (is closed = false) - assigned to the current team
recordUpdates.name: Transfer_open_tasks_team_change
recordUpdates.label: Transfer open tasks

recordUpdates.description: Update the household to remove the specialist
recordUpdates.name: Update_household_remove_specialist
recordUpdates.label: Update household

recordUpdates.description: Update the household to remove the specialist
recordUpdates.name: Update_household_remove_specialist_0
recordUpdates.label: Update household

recordUpdates.description: Update the household to add the specialist
recordUpdates.name: Update_household_specialist_added
recordUpdates.label: Update household

recordUpdates.description: Update the household to commit the change in team.
recordUpdates.name: Update_household_team
recordUpdates.label: Update household

screens.description: Presents information via to invalidation of TOB.
screens.name: choice_screen
screens.label: Choice screen

fields.name: case_type_message
fields.fieldText: Please specify the following details and click next to create the case.

validationRule.errorMessage: Description is limited to 255 characters

screens.description: Screen presenting options to change the team.
screens.name: Choose_team
screens.label: Choose team

fields.name: current_team_message
fields.fieldText: Please choose the team for this household.

screens.description: Screen presenting options for managing the dedicated specialist looking after this household
screens.name: Manage_specialist
screens.label: Manage specialist

fields.name: current_dedicated_specialist_message
fields.fieldText:
{!Get_household_details.OW_dedicated_specialist__r.FirstName} {!Get_household_details.OW_dedicated_specialist__r.LastName} is the dedicated specialist for this household.


Please choose a new owner or remove {!Get_household_details.OW_dedicated_specialist__r.FirstName}.

fields.name: choose_dedicated_specialist_message
fields.fieldText: This household is not currently assigned to anyone. Please choose a dedicated specialist below.

screens.description: Screen confirming no action was taken because the team did not change.
screens.name: No_action_taken
screens.label: No action taken

fields.name: current_team_message_0
fields.fieldText: No action has been taken as a different team wasn't chosen.

screens.description: Screen confirming no action was taken because the team did not change.
screens.name: No_action_taken_0
screens.label: No action taken

fields.name: current_team_message_0_0
fields.fieldText: No action has been taken as no changes were made.

screens.description: Screen confirming no action was taken because the team did not change.
screens.name: No_action_taken_0_0
screens.label: No action taken

fields.name: current_team_message_0_0_0
fields.fieldText: No action has been taken as no changes were made.

screens.description: Screen to display a message to the user when there are no actions available.
screens.name: No_actions_screen
screens.label: No actions screen

fields.name: no_actions_message
fields.fieldText:
There are no actions available for this record.


If you think you are seeing this in error, please contact an admin.

variables.description: Stores the labels for the management options.
variables.name: management_choice_labels

variables.description: Stores the values for the management options.
variables.name: management_choice_values

variables.description: Stores the IDs of the users who should receive the notification that they are the dedicated specialist, one person in this case.
variables.name: notificationRecipientIds

variables.description: Stores the ID of the TOB record.
variables.name: recordId

variables.description: True if the specialist should be removed
variables.name: remove_specialist

variables.description: Stores the value selected by the user on the first screen.
variables.name: selected_option

variables.description: True if new TOB were sent successfully.
variables.name: send_tob_success
